import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function CreateArticle() { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [ref, setRef] = useState(""); const [achatbrut, setAchatbrut] = useState(""); const [remise1, setRemise1] = useState(""); const [achatar1, setAchatar1] = useState(""); const [remise2, setRemise2] = useState(""); const [achatar2, setAchatar2] = useState(""); const [tva, setTva] = useState(""); const [achatttc, setAchatttc] = useState(""); const [mbenif, setMbenif] = useState(""); const [venteht, setVenteht] = useState(""); const [ventettc, setVentettc] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:7777/article/createAr/", { arName: name, ref: ref, prachat: achatbrut, remise1: remise1, prar1: achatar1, remise2: remise2, prar2: achatar2, tva: tva, achatttc: achatttc, margeben: mbenif, prventeht: venteht, prventettc: ventettc, }) .then((res) => { console.log(res); navigate("/article/"); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); } return (

); } export default CreateArticle;
